text: Giuseppe Natoli Gongora di Scaliti (9 June 1815 â€“ 25 September 1867) was an Italian lawyer and politician from the Mediterranean island of Sicily. He was Minister of Agriculture under Camillo Benso, Count of Cavour, in the first government of the Kingdom of Italy after unification in 1861. title: Giuseppe Natoli
